name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.vectorStorePinecone
semantic_context: Work with your data in Pinecone Vector Store

ragStarterCallout.displayName: Tip: Get a feel for vector stores in n8n with our
ragStarterCallout.name: ragStarterCallout

mode.name: mode

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many ranked documents from vector store for query
options.action: Get ranked documents from vector store

options.name: Retrieve Documents (As Vector Store for Chain/Tool)
options.description: Retrieve documents from vector store to be used as vector store with AI nodes
options.action: Retrieve documents for Chain/Tool as Vector Store

options.name: Retrieve Documents (As Tool for AI Agent)
options.description: Retrieve documents from vector store to be used as tool with AI nodes
options.action: Retrieve documents for AI Agent as Tool

options.name: Update Documents
options.description: Update documents in vector store by ID

mode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to a vector store retriever. Insert one
notice.name: notice

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.placeholder: e.g. Work with your data in Pinecone Vector Store
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

embeddingBatchSize.name: embeddingBatchSize
embeddingBatchSize.description: Number of documents to embed in a single batch
embeddingBatchSize.ai_hint: Number of documents to embed in a single batch

options.name: options
pineconeNamespace
options.description: Partition the records in an index into namespaces. Queries and other operations are then limited to one namespace, so different requests can search different subsets of your index.

options.name: metadata
options.description: Metadata to filter the document by

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: Search prompt to retrieve matching documents from the vector store using similarity-based ranking
prompt.ai_hint: Search prompt to retrieve matching documents from the vector store using similarity-based ranking

topK.name: topK
topK.description: Number of top results to fetch from vector store
topK.ai_hint: Number of top results to fetch from vector store

includeDocumentMetadata.name: includeDocumentMetadata
includeDocumentMetadata.description: Whether or not to include document metadata

useReranker.name: useReranker
useReranker.description: Whether or not to rerank results

conditional_rules: IF @version == {'_cnd': {'lte': 1.2}} AND mode == 'retrieve-as-tool' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolName'
IF mode == 'insert' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.1}} THEN SHOW parameter 'embeddingBatchSize'
IF mode IN ["load", "retrieve-as-tool"] THEN SHOW parameter 'topK'
IF mode IN ["load", "retrieve-as-tool"] THEN SHOW parameter 'includeDocumentMetadata'
IF mode IN ["load", "retrieve", "retrieve-as-tool"] THEN SHOW parameter 'useReranker'
IF mode IN ["load", "retrieve-as-tool"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
